name: antigravis 2
description:
An attempt to combine a platform game with a breakout style game. A sequel to another game made in the games factory. Developed in 2003 using C++ and the Allegro game library. Still runs fine on windows 10. See the readme file for how to use the config. You can probably figure out how to edit the level files to change the levels if you wish.

Follow me on @thevoicesgames for updates on my newest game

or visit www.thevoicesgames.uk
